Semantic Ethical Glass Box (SEGB) documentation¶

This service is the SEGB API, a RESTful API designed to manage and query the SEGB system. The SEGB serves as a Semantic Ethical Glass Box for registering and managing the results of activities conducted by robots or intelligent agents interacting with humans. The API provides endpoints for:

  • Logging and auditing activities data.

  • Managing the SEGB graph, including retrieval, deletion, and querying.

  • Retrieving activities-specific information and history.

Developed by¶

HumanAILab, managed by GSI-UPM¶

This Semantic Ethical Glass Box (SEGB) service is part of the HumanAILab, which is managed by the Grupo de Sistemas Inteligentes (GSI) at the Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM).

Funding¶

Project funded by the Spanish Ministry for Economic Affairs and Digital Transformation and by the European Union - NextGenerationEU within the Programme UNICO I+D Cloud.
